title: Automata and Computability
description: Finite state machines, regular languages, regular expressions, applications of regular languages, grammars, context-free languages, models of computation, computability and decidability.
schedule: Three lectures, one tutorial (two hours); second term; may be offered also in the first term
courseText: Finite state machines, regular languages, regular expressions, applications of regular languages, grammars, context-free languages, models of computation, computability and decidability.
